meanings.definition: The state or quality of being packed tightly together.
meanings.sent1: The packness of the books on the shelf made it hard to find the one I needed.
meanings.sent2: The packness of the crowd at the concert made it difficult to move around.
meanings.sent3: The packness of the suitcase made it impossible to fit in any more clothes.
meanings.sent4: The packness of the traffic on the highway reminded me of sardines in a can.
meanings.sent5: The packness of the forest trees created a sense of coziness and security.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being organized and efficient in a group or team.
meanings.sent1: The team's packness in completing the project ahead of schedule impressed the boss.
meanings.sent2: The packness of the soccer team's defense made it hard for the opponents to score.
meanings.sent3: The packness of the ants working together to build their nest was quite remarkable.
meanings.sent4: The packness of the gears in the clock symbolized the team's synchronized effort.
meanings.sent5: The packness of the choir singers' voices blended harmoniously during the performance.
